title: A Blizzard of Goodwill
description:
Nikki and Mr. Malone tell some new stories from around the world and delve into their own stories of Christmas past for this fun holiday episode!

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--

Support us by supporting our sponsors!

Find your perfect fit with ThirdLove. For 10% off your first order, use promo code SMILE at ThirdLove.com/SMILE
